author: AwesomeDragon97
long_description:
Generic Inoffensive Flags

This is a mod that adds generic flags in multiple different colors. In addition, it uses a flexible and extendable design with an api to easily add more flags and disable the default ones.
Crafting the Items:

Make a flagpole using the following recipe, where s is steel. (requires the default mod). ┏  ┳  ┳  ┓
      s
┣  ╋  ╋  ┫
      s
┣  ╋  ╋  ┫
      s
┗  ┻  ┻  ┛ Make a flag using the following recipe, where w is wool. ┏  ┳  ┳  ┓
   w   w   w
┣  ╋  ╋  ┫
   w   w   w
┣  ╋  ╋  ┫

┗  ┻  ┻  ┛ When you place the flag, left click to cycle through all of the colors.
Attribution:

The original concept and code was created by Wuzzy and Sorcerykid.
name: generic_flags
short_description: Adds generic flags that come in multiple basic colors.
title: Generic Inoffensive Flags
